Text:
(Hmm, what to do with the outfits... It's not like I
knew a ton about idols in my previous life.)

(I'm gonna have to rely on what I do remember while
thinking of what most people in society here will
like... The best place to start would be scoping the
lay of the land.)

(Now, who do I know that'll spit out the most basic
takes for this world, no filter...)

...So, you're askin' what I'd pick if I could have
Rose wear anything I wanted? That's a super tough
question.

You're serious, right?! Anything? Like, ANYTHING
anything?! You really mean it?!
Y-Yeah... But this is just an "if" scenario.

A swimsuit! And it's gotta be one of those ones
that's like a string! Rose would look amazing!
Heh...

Wh-What gives, Po...? I coulda swore you just laughed
at me...

Get with the program, Po... You're so clueless.
See, in situations like these...

...it's all about if you can just barely get
a peek of somethin' or not, right?

O-Oh, good point! A gentleman's horizon lies beyond
what is hidden!

Exactly! We're gonna peep what's past that line!
You and me, bro!
Gimme a peek of the sweet stuff, baby!
Uh, hahaha...

(Oh man, these guys are hopeless. Not gonna learn a
thing from them...)

(Well, guess I'll have to see what they can pull off
with their sense and what I remember.)

...And so, you have come to speak with myself and
the rest of us at Mitsugoshi?

It is a great honor to have you seek us out for
advice in person, my lord! I, your humble servant
Gamma, shall endeavor with all of my being to fulfill
your wishes!
It's nothing that grandiose...but thanks.

Now, let us try to settle on a firm image. May I ask
a few questions of you, my lord?
Sure, if there's anything you need to know, ask away.

Thank you. Firstly, can you tell me more of what you
mean when you say "idol"?

Hmm, let's see... An idol is like...someone who's
adored by her fans because she makes them happy by
smiling, singing, and dancing.

I see. So, they are similar to actresses or opera
singers?

They're more mass-market than all that. Think...
kinda ordinary at worst, or familiar at best.

So, you are after commonplace dresses meant for the
general public. In that case, Mitsugoshi can launch a
new brand that—

Uh, wait, wait. I was talking about the idols
themselves, not their dresses.
Which means?

I guess the beauty I'm after is more cute than calm
and composed. Something with school uniform elements
to it could work, too.

A school uniform would certainly create an impression
of familiarity. In that case, how about
something that incorporates the sailor collars that
have been so popular of late?

That might be kinda plain. It'd also be a little too
obvious of an attempt to appeal to the crowd.
What...?!

(The sailor style we were told would revolutionize
the fashion world is...plain?!)

(The trends of society truly are beneath our　lord's
sophistication... How I hate that I can't see what
it is he sees!)

I'd like to hear some other ideas, but maybe this is
too tough of a task.

Thing is, I can't do this myself. You're my only
hope, Gamma!
Huh...? S-So, you mean to say...!

(Can't afford to compromise here... An idol's
costumes are her lifeblood. They can make a huge
difference in how much she brings in—no joke!)

(Doesn't change the fact that I have no fashion sense
or skill at making clothes, though...so Gamma's the
only one I can turn to!)

Um, my lord...to come to me with such a request at
a time like this...
...It's quite unfair.

Huh? Well, maybe it was a little unfair of me to dump
all this on you.

I'll do my best to help, too. Call it a collaborative
effort.
A-A collaborative effort?!

(This powerful gaze... Should I take this to mean
he's serious? But am I even worthy of such
attention...?)

(...No, Gamma. My lord singled me out specifically.
Which means there is only on course of action—)

...A collaborative effort between the two of us.
Let's give it our all.
Y-Yeah... Looking forward to working with you.

So, the person I know whose friend's mother's boss's...
Uh, anyway, I had that designer make the dresses, so
how do they fit?

What an adorable design! And so easy to move about
in...!

Yes, very novel... I've never seen anything quite
like them. I think these will do just fine.
Awesome, that's what I like to hear.

The designer's delicate heart really shows in the
fine workmanship and attention to detail.

I agree. I can almost sense how they must have felt
while making them...
(Huh, well I don't get it at all.)

Since I can't imagine either of you are used to
costumes like these, how about wearing them for a
while as practice?

A fine idea. Rehearsing in such wonderful attire will
also be motivating!

So, with our wardrobe settled...next we need music
for us to sing and dance to.

Right. That's why I was thinking of asking this
composer who lives next door to a guy who works
for my classmate's dad to—

Hehe, no, this time I insist! I'll commission the
most beautiful music ever!
Hmm...?

Very well. We'll leave all matters of music up to
you, Alexia. I look forward to hearing the results!
(I'm not so sure about this...)
